title: The.Sting.1973.DVDRip.XviD.AC3[5.1].AR
description:
The Sting (1973)

Director:
George Roy Hill
Writer (WGA):
David S. Ward (written by)

Genre:
Comedy / Crime

Plot Synopsis: It is 1932 and money runner enters a mans office. He is told that a payment is due and is sent off with 50,000. On the way three men con him by replacing his money with kleenex. The mobster, Doyle Lonnigan (Robert Shaw) who was supposed to get the money exacts revenge by throwing one of the men, Luther (Robert Earl Jones) out the window. One of the other men, Hooker (Robert Redford) goes to Chicago to escape Lonnigan&#039;s wrath. In Chicago he meets Henry Gondorff (Paul Newman) and they set up an elaborate plan to con Lonnigan out of his money in revenge of Luther&#039;s death.

Cast

Henry Gondorff (Paul Newman)
Johnny Hooker (Robert Redford)
Doyle Lonnegan (Robert Shaw)
Lt. Wm. Snyder (Charles Durning)
J.J. Singleton (Ray Walston)
Billie (Eileen Brennan)
Kid Twist (Harold Gould)
Eddie Niles (John Heffernan)
F.B.I. Agent Polk (Dana Elcar)
Erie Kid (Jack Kehoe)
Loretta (Dimitra Arliss)
Luther Coleman (as Robertearl Jones)
Mottola (as James J. Sloyan)
Floyd (Bodyguard) (Charles Dierkop)
Bodyguard (Lee Paul)
